mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.product_title, p.class_category, p.price_per_person, p.max_capacity, s.schedule from product_tbl p Left join schedule_tbl s on p.product_no = s.product_no where p.product_title = #{product_title}
mapper.insert: insert into product_tbl (product_no, product_title, owner_no, class_category, class_detail, price_per_person, max_capacity, location, location_code) values (seq_board.nextval, #{product_title}, #{owner_no}, #{class_category}, #{class_detail}, #{price_per_person}, #{max_capacity}, #{location}, #{location_code})
